### Tender Description and Registration
--------------------------------------
This solicitation is for the purchase of a software and related technical specifications for Shared Services Canada. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal to view and access solicitations from SSC, provide a response to a solicitation, receive updates and amendments, and submit invoices for payment status updates. To register, visit the SSC P2P portal at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr
